grassland.name: Grassland
grassland.description: Can be used for farming, building and grazing livestock.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: A source of wood, but increases wildness and cannot be used for farming.

coast.name: Coast
coast.description: To catch fish you'll need to venture a little further out. A jetty can be built here to land boats.

sea.name: Open sea
sea.description: Teeming with fish of all types, waiting for brave fishing boats to catch.
